entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
